commit message:
check the free space of the right partition, not always /sdcard (closes #53)

The Install screen checks to make sure there is enough disk space to fit
the requested image size.  It was only checking the 'External Storage' aka
/sdcard even when the preference was set for somewhere else.  This fixes it
so that the actual location is checked rather than always /sdcard
include Transifex .tx/config based on Orweb's to auto-download translations

make DNS resolving work for all users  (closes #54)

set /etc/resolv.conf to have -rw-r--r-- perms
